mapper.select: SELECT A.PROD_ID , ADMININV_NM , ADMININV_DETAIL , ADMININV_QY , PROD_SLE_NM , PROD_SLE_PC , PROD_REGIST_DE , PROD_DC , PROD_IMAGE , B.CMMN_CODE_ID , CMMN_REMARK1 , CMMN_CODE_NM FROM ADMININV A INNER JOIN PROD B ON (A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID) INNER JOIN CMMNCODE C ON (B.CMMN_CODE_ID = C.CMMN_CODE_ID) WHERE A.PROD_ID = #{prodId}

SELECT A.PROD_ID ,PROD_SLE_NM ,PROD_SLE_PC ,PROD_DC ,PROD_IMAGE ,CMMN_REMARK1 ,CMMN_CODE_NM FROM PROD A INNER JOIN CMMNCODE B ON (A.CMMN_CODE_ID = B.CMMN_CODE_ID) WHERE A.CMMN_CODE_ID = #{lprod.cmmnCodeId}

SELECT REVIEW_NO , REVIEW_SJ , REVIEW_CN , REVIEW_DE , REVIEW_IMAGE , REVIEW_SCORE , A.PROD_ID , A.MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_NM FROM REVIEW A INNER JOIN MEMBER B ON (A.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO) WHERE PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND REVIEW_BLIND_AT = 'N'
